1: -module(hty_inte_SUITE).
    2: -compile(export_all).
    3: 
    4: all() -> [
    5:     hello,
    6:     {group, accesslog},
    7:     {group, 'catch'},
    8:     {group, move},
    9:     {group, history},
   10:     {group, static},
   11:     {group, staticlisting},
   12:     {group, vhosts},
   13:     {group, xslpi}
   14: ].
   15: 
   16: groups() -> [
   17:     {accesslog, [
   18:       accesslog_check_request_logged
   19:     ]},
   20:     {'catch', [
   21:         catch_forward
   22:     ]},
   23:     {history, [
   24:       history_empty,
   25:       history_unparsable_body,
   26:       history_post_and_reread,
   27:       history_get_latest,
   28:       history_get_earlier,
   29:       history_expect_conflict
   30:     ]},
   31:     {move, [
   32:         move_file,
   33:         move_folder
   34:     ]},
   35:     {static, [
   36:         static_get_rootfile,
   37:         static_get_subfile,
   38:         static_index_txt_welcome,
   39:         static_get_rootindex,
   40:         static_get_subindex
   41:     ]},
   42:     {staticlisting, [
   43:         staticlisting_list_root,
   44:         staticlisting_list_sub,
   45:         staticlisting_prefer_welcomefile
   46:     ]},
   47:     {vhosts, [
   48:       vhosts_basic,
   49:       vhosts_subdomains
   50:     ]},
   51:     {xslpi, [
   52:       xslpi_basic
   53:     ]}
   54: ].
   55: 
   56: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   57:     ok = inets:start(),
   58:     Config.
   59: 
   60: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   61:     ok = inets:stop(),
   62:     Config.
   63: 
   64: init_per_group(Group, Config) ->
   65:     Groupname = atom_to_list(Group),
   66:     Groupdir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config) ++ Groupname,
   67:     Fromdir = Groupdir ++ "/fixture",
   68:     Todir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config) ++ Groupname ++ "/fixture",
   69:     copy_fixture(Fromdir, Todir),
   70:     {ok, _Pid} = hty_main:start([Todir]),
   71:     [{wwwroot, Todir},
   72:      {files_dir, Groupdir ++ "/files"}|Config].
   73: 
   74: end_per_group(Group, Config) ->
   75:     ok = hty_main:stop(),
   76:     Config.
   77: 
   78: init_per_testcase(Test, Config) ->
   79:     io:format(user, "About to start httpc with profile ~p~n", [Test]),
   80:     {ok, _} = inets:start(httpc, [{profile, Test}]),
   81:     [{tc_name, Test}|Config].
   82: 
   83: end_per_testcase(Test, _Config) ->
   84:     %Httpcpid = proplists:get_value(httpc_pid, Config, no_httpc_pid_config),
   85:     ok = inets:stop(httpc, Test).
   86: 
   87: %%% Support
   88: copy_fixture(From, To) ->
   89:     case filelib:is_dir(From) of
   90:         true ->
   91:             filelib:ensure_dir(To),
   92:             file:make_dir(To),
   93:             {ok, Filenames} = file:list_dir(From),
   94:             lists:foreach(fun(Filename) ->
   95:                 copy_fixture(From ++ "/" ++ Filename, To ++ "/" ++ Filename)
   96:             end, Filenames);
   97:         false ->
   98:             ok = filelib:ensure_dir(To),
   99:             io:format("Copying from ~s to ~s", [From, To]),
  100:             {ok, _} = file:copy(From, To)
  101:     end.
  102: 
  103: -record(exchange, {
  104:     method = get,
  105:     req_headers = [],
  106:     req_file = none,
  107:     req_body = none,
  108:     url = no_url,
  109:     status = 200,
  110:     rsp_headers = [],
  111:     rsp_body = no_rsp_body,
  112:     rsp_file = no_rsp_file,
  113:     rsp_pattern = no_rsp_pattern,
  114:     entity_compare = strict :: strict | trimmed
  115: }).
  116: 
  117: run_test(Exchanges, Config) ->
  118:     Testcase = proplists:get_value(tc_name, Config),
  119:     run_test(Testcase, Exchanges, Config).
  120: 
  121: run_test(Test, Exchange, Config) when is_record(Exchange, exchange) ->
  122:   run_test(Test, [Exchange], Config);
  123: run_test(Test, Exchanges, Config) when is_list(Exchanges) ->
  124:     Filesdir = proplists:get_value(files_dir, Config)
  125:       ++ "/" ++ atom_to_list(Test) ++ "/",
  126:     lists:foreach(fun(X) ->
  127:         Request = case {X#exchange.req_file, X#exchange.req_body} of
  128:           {none, none} -> {
  129:               X#exchange.url,
  130:               X#exchange.req_headers
  131:           };
  132:           {Reqfile, none} -> {
  133:               X#exchange.url,
  134:               X#exchange.req_headers,
  135:               proplists:get_value("content-type",
  136:                 X#exchange.req_headers, "application/octet-stream"),
  137:               hty_result:assume_ok(file:read_file(Filesdir ++ Reqfile))
  138:           };
  139:           {none, Reqbody} -> {
  140:             X#exchange.url,
  141:             X#exchange.req_headers,
  142:             proplists:get_value("content-type",
  143:               X#exchange.req_headers, "application/octet-stream"),
  144:             Reqbody
  145:           };
  146:           {_,_} -> error(dont_specify_both_req_file_and_req_body)
  147:         end,
  148:         {ok, Response} = httpc:request(
  149:             X#exchange.method,
  150:             Request,
  151:             [], % HttpOptions
  152:             [{body_format, binary}], % Options
  153:             Test),
  154:         {{_, Status, StatusMessage}, ResponseHeaders, Body} = Response,
  155:         case X#exchange.status of
  156:             undefined -> ok;
  157:             Status -> ok;
  158:             _ -> notok = io:format("Wrong status [~p ~p]~n", [Status, StatusMessage])
  159:         end,
  160:         lists:foreach(fun({Name, Value}) ->
  161:             io:format("Looking for header ~s=~s in ~p~n", [Name, Value, ResponseHeaders]),
  162:             true = lists:member({Name, Value}, ResponseHeaders)
  163:         end, X#exchange.rsp_headers),
  164: 
  165:         case X#exchange.rsp_pattern of
  166:           no_rsp_pattern -> ok;
  167:           Pattern ->
  168:             case re:compile(Pattern) of
  169:               {ok, Mp} ->
  170:                 case re:run(Body, Mp) of
  171:                   {match, _} -> ok;
  172:                   nomatch ->
  173:                    throw({error, ["Expected match against ", Pattern, " but got ", Body]})
  174:                 end;
  175:               {error, {Error, Pos}} ->
  176:                 throw({error, ["Bad regex", Error, Pos]})
  177:             end
  178:         end,
  179: 
  180:         case X#exchange.rsp_body of
  181:             no_rsp_body -> ok;
  182:             Body -> ok;
  183:             OtherBody ->
  184:               case X#exchange.entity_compare of
  185:                 strict -> 
  186:                   throw({error, ["Expected ", Body, " but got ", OtherBody]});  
  187:                 trimmed -> trim_compare(OtherBody, Body)
  188:               end
  189:         end,
  190:         case X#exchange.rsp_file of
  191:             no_rsp_file -> ok;
  192:             Filename ->
  193:                 Filepath = Filesdir ++ Filename,
  194:                 io:format("Reading facit file ~s~n", [Filepath]),
  195:                 {ok, Facit} = file:read_file(Filepath),
  196:                 io:format("About to compare facit [~s]~n with response body [~s]~n", [Facit, Body]),
  197:                 case X#exchange.entity_compare of
  198:                   strict -> Facit = Body;
  199:                   trimmed -> trim_compare(Facit, Body)
  200:                 end
  201:         end
  202:     end, Exchanges).
  203: 
  204: trim_compare(Bin1, Bin2) when is_binary(Bin1) ->
  205:   trim_compare(binary_to_list(Bin1), Bin2);
  206: trim_compare(Str1, Bin2) when is_binary(Bin2) ->
  207:   trim_compare(Str1, binary_to_list(Bin2));
  208: trim_compare(Str1, Str2) ->
  209:   S1 = string:trim(Str1),
  210:   S2 = string:trim(Str2),
  211:   S1 = S2.
  212: 
  213: hello(Config) -> ok.
  214: 
  215: catch_forward(Config) ->
  216:   run_test(#exchange{
  217:     url = "http://localhost:1029/helloworld.html",
  218:     rsp_headers = [
  219:         {"content-type", "text/html"}
  220:     ],
  221:     rsp_file = "facit.html"
  222:   }, Config).
  223: 
  224: static_get_rootfile(Config) ->
  225:     run_test(#exchange{
  226:                 url = "http://localhost:1031/rootfile.html",
  227:                 rsp_headers = [
  228:                     {"content-type", "text/html"}
  229:                 ],
  230:                 rsp_file = "facit.html"
  231:             },
  232:             Config).
  233: 
  234: static_get_subfile(Config) ->
  235:     run_test(#exchange{
  236:                 url = "http://localhost:1031/subfolder/subfile.html",
  237:                 rsp_headers = [
  238:                     {"content-type", "text/html"}
  239:                 ],
  240:                 rsp_file = "facit.html"
  241:             },
  242:             Config).
  243: 
  244: static_index_txt_welcome(Config) ->
  245:     run_test(#exchange{
  246:               url = "http://localhost:1031/subfolderwithtextindex/",
  247:               rsp_headers = [
  248:                   {"content-type", "text/plain"}
  249:               ],
  250:               rsp_file = "facit.txt"
  251:             },
  252:             Config).
  253: 
  254: static_get_rootindex(Config) ->
  255:   run_test(#exchange{
  256:             url = "http://localhost:1031/",
  257:             rsp_headers = [
  258:                 {"content-type", "text/html"}
  259:             ],
  260:             rsp_file = "facit.html"
  261:           },
  262:           Config).
  263: 
  264: static_get_subindex(Config) ->
  265:   run_test(#exchange{
  266:           url = "http://localhost:1031/subfolder",
  267:           rsp_headers = [
  268:               {"content-type", "text/html"}
  269:           ],
  270:           rsp_file = "facit.html"
  271:         },
  272:         Config).
  273: 
  274: staticlisting_list_root(Config) ->
  275:   run_test(#exchange{
  276:           url = "http://localhost:1032/",
  277:           rsp_headers = [
  278:               {"content-type", "application/xml"}
  279:           ],
  280:           rsp_file = "facit.xml",
  281:           entity_compare = trimmed
  282:         },
  283:         Config).
  284: 
  285: staticlisting_list_sub(Config) ->
  286:   run_test(#exchange{
  287:           url = "http://localhost:1032/subfolder/",
  288:           rsp_headers = [
  289:               {"content-type", "application/xml"}
  290:           ],
  291:           rsp_file = "facit.xml",
  292:           entity_compare = trimmed
  293:         },
  294:         Config).
  295: 
  296: staticlisting_prefer_welcomefile(Config) ->
  297:   run_test(#exchange{
  298:           url = "http://localhost:1032/subfolder/index.html",
  299:           rsp_headers = [
  300:               {"content-type", "text/html"}
  301:           ],
  302:           rsp_file = "facit.html"
  303:         },
  304:         Config).
  305: 
  306: xslpi_basic(Config) ->
  307:   run_test(#exchange{
  308:     url = "http://localhost:1030/docs/resource.xml",
  309:     rsp_headers = [
  310:       {"content-type", "text/xml"}
  311:     ],
  312:     rsp_file = "facit.xml"
  313:     },
  314:     Config).
  315: 
  316: accesslog_check_request_logged(Cfg) -> run_test([
  317:   #exchange{
  318:     url = "http://localhost:1028/helloworld.txt",
  319:     rsp_headers = [
  320:       {"content-type", "text/plain"}
  321:     ],
  322:     rsp_file = "facit.txt"
  323:   },
  324:   #exchange{
  325:     url = "http://localhost:1028/logs",
  326:     rsp_headers = [
  327:       {"content-type", "text/plain"}
  328:     ],
  329:     rsp_pattern = "^.*|GET /helloworld.txt| .* 200"
  330:     }
  331:   ], Cfg).
  332:   
  333:   
  334: move_file(Cfg) -> run_test([
  335:     #exchange{
  336:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/oldname",
  337:         rsp_pattern = <<"Hello, world!">>
  338:     },
  339:     #exchange{
  340:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/newname",
  341:         status = 404
  342:     },
  343:     #exchange{
  344:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/oldname",
  345:         method = delete,
  346:         req_headers = [
  347:             {"destination", "newname"},
  348:             {"overwrite", "F"},
  349:             {"x-http-method-override", "MOVE"}
  350:         ],
  351:         rsp_headers = [
  352:             {"location", "newname"}
  353:         ]
  354:     },
  355:     #exchange{
  356:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/newname",
  357:         rsp_pattern = <<"Hello, world!">>
  358:     },
  359:     #exchange{
  360:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/oldname",
  361:         status = 404
  362:     }], Cfg).
  363:     
  364: move_folder(Cfg) -> run_test([
  365:     #exchange{
  366:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/oldfolder/filename",
  367:         rsp_pattern = <<"Hello, world!">>
  368:     },
  369:     #exchange{
  370:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/newfolder/filename",
  371:         status = 404
  372:     },
  373:     #exchange{
  374:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/oldfolder/filename",
  375:         method = delete,
  376:         req_headers = [
  377:             {"destination", "/data/files/newfolder/filename"},
  378:             {"overwrite", "F"},
  379:             {"x-http-method-override", "MOVE"}
  380:         ],
  381:         rsp_headers = [
  382:             {"location", "/data/files/newfolder/filename"}
  383:         ]
  384:     },
  385:     #exchange{
  386:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/newfolder/filename",
  387:         rsp_pattern = <<"Hello, world!">>
  388:     },
  389:     #exchange{
  390:         url = "http://localhost:1034/data/files/oldfolder/filename",
  391:         status = 404
  392:     }], Cfg).
  393: 
  394: history_unparsable_body(Cfg) ->
  395:   run_test(
  396:     #exchange{
  397:       method = post,
  398:       url = "http://localhost:1033/unparsable.xml",
  399:       status = 400,
  400:       req_headers = [
  401:         {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  402:       ],
  403:       req_body = <<"[=root&\"=lite_text&]=annan_root">>
  404:     }
  405:   ,Cfg).
  406: 
  407: history_get_latest(Cfg) -> run_test([
  408:   #exchange{
  409:     url = "http://localhost:1033/get_latest.xml",
  410:     method = post,
  411:     req_headers = [
  412:       {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  413:     ],
  414:     req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=orangutang&]=apa&]=apor"
  415:   },
  416:   #exchange{
  417:     url = "http://localhost:1033/get_latest.xml",
  418:     method = post,
  419:     req_headers = [
  420:       {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  421:     ],
  422:     req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=bonobo&]=apa&]=apor"
  423:   },
  424:   #exchange{
  425:     url = "http://localhost:1033/get_latest.xml",
  426:     rsp_body = "<apor><apa>bonobo</apa></apor>",
  427:     entity_compare = trimmed
  428:   }
  429:   ], Cfg).
  430: 
  431: 
  432: history_get_earlier(Cfg) -> run_test([
  433:   #exchange{
  434:     url = "http://localhost:1033/get_earlier.xml",
  435:     method = post,
  436:     req_headers = [
  437:       {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  438:     ],
  439:     req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=orangutang&]=apa&]=apor"
  440:   },
  441:   #exchange{
  442:     url = "http://localhost:1033/get_earlier.xml",
  443:     method = post,
  444:     req_headers = [
  445:       {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  446:     ],
  447:     req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=bonobo&]=apa&]=apor"
  448:   },
  449:   #exchange{
  450:     url = "http://localhost:1033/get_earlier.xml;rev=0",
  451:     rsp_body = "<apor><apa>orangutang</apa></apor>",
  452:     entity_compare = trimmed
  453:   }
  454: ], Cfg).
  455: 
  456: history_expect_conflict(Cfg) -> run_test([
  457:   #exchange{
  458:     url = "http://localhost:1033/expect_conflict.xml",
  459:     method = post,
  460:     req_headers = [
  461:       {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  462:     ],
  463:     req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=orangutang&]=apa&]=apor"
  464:   },
  465:   #exchange{
  466:     url = "http://localhost:1033/expect_conflict.xml;rev=0",
  467:     method = post,
  468:     req_headers = [
  469:       {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  470:     ],
  471:     req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=bonobo&]=apa&]=apor"
  472:   },
  473:   #exchange{
  474:     url = "http://localhost:1033/expect_conflict.xml;rev=0",
  475:     method = post,
  476:     req_headers = [
  477:       {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  478:     ],
  479:     status = 409,
  480:     req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=gorilla&]=apa&]=apor"
  481:   },
  482:   #exchange{
  483:     url = "http://localhost:1033/expect_conflict.xml",
  484:     rsp_body = "<apor><apa>bonobo</apa></apor>",
  485:     entity_compare = trimmed
  486:   }
  487: ], Cfg).
  488: 
  489: history_post_and_reread(Cfg) ->
  490:   run_test([
  491:     #exchange{
  492:       url = "http://localhost:1033/apor.xml",
  493:       method = post,
  494:       req_headers = [
  495:         {"content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
  496:       ],
  497:       req_body = "[=apor&[=apa&\"=orangutang&]=apa&]=apor"
  498:     },
  499:     #exchange{
  500:       url = "http://localhost:1033/apor.xml",
  501:       rsp_file = "facit.xml",
  502:       entity_compare = trimmed
  503:     }
  504:   ], Cfg).
  505: 
  506: history_empty(Config) ->
  507:   run_test(#exchange{
  508:     url = "http://localhost:1033/finns_inte.xml",
  509:     status = 404
  510:   }, Config).
  511: 
  512: vhosts_basic(Cfg) ->
  513:   run_test([#exchange{
  514:         url = "http://localhost:1035/basic/index.txt",
  515:         req_headers = [
  516:           {"accept", "text/plain"},
  517:           {"host", "orangutang"}
  518:         ],
  519:         status = 200,
  520:         rsp_body = <<"Hello Orangutan!">>
  521:   }, #exchange{
  522:         url = "http://localhost:1035/basic/index.txt",
  523:         req_headers = [
  524:           {"accept", "text/plain"},
  525:           {"host", "schimpans"}
  526:         ],
  527:         status = 200,
  528:         rsp_body = <<"Hello Chimpanzee!">>
  529:   }], Cfg).
  530: 
  531:   vhosts_subdomains(Cfg) ->
  532:     run_test([#exchange{
  533:           url = "http://localhost:1035/subdomains/index.txt",
  534:           req_headers = [
  535:             {"accept", "text/plain"},
  536:             {"host", "orangutang.jenspersson.com"}
  537:           ],
  538:           status = 200,
  539:           rsp_body = <<"Hello Orangutan!">>
  540:     }, #exchange{
  541:           url = "http://localhost:1035/subdomains/index.txt",
  542:           req_headers = [
  543:             {"accept", "text/plain"},
  544:             {"host", "schimpans.jenspersson.com"}
  545:           ],
  546:           status = 200,
  547:           rsp_body = <<"Hello Chimpanzee!">>
  548:     }], Cfg).
  549:
